subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio hit his first grand slam in 13 years with one out in the ninth last night and the Houston Astros defeated the Milwaukee Brewers, 6-5, to extend their winning streak to five games.
snippet: Craig Biggio hit his first grand slam in 13 years with one out in the ninth last night and the Houston Astros defeated the Milwaukee Brewers, 6-5, to extend their winning streak to five games.
